page.title: 11GUITING POWER.PLAYGROUP
page.content: The Playgroup meets three mornings per week in the Village Hall. The number of children who attend is 10. They are three and four years old, but there is also a Mother and Baby group once a week. The children pay 50p per day, but the Playgroup also makes money by Sponsored Bike Rides,Jumble Sales and a Christmas Fair. Mums take turns to help the Playgroup leader. Each year, the Playgroup leader spends about 50-80 on equipment. They have ten large pieces of apparatus, and about 100 small toys. The toys are fun, but the children also learn from them as they play.
